channel.title: Password on Straying from the Google-able
channel.description: Recent content in Password on Straying from the Google-able

item.title: Password Schema
item.description: A while ago a friend told me that a phrase was better to use for a password than a bunch of jumbled characters. For instance, using “This is a secure password.” would “SD4#ac”. I didn’t believe him which started some email exchanges in which I basically proved myself wrong (with basic math). The following is what i found.
